amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Streets; grading and repair; bridges and sewers; tax limits.
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of section 17-508, cities of the second class and villages shall have power to levy in any one year not to exceed ten and five-tenths cents on each one hundred dollars upon the taxable value of all the taxable property within the limits of such cities and villages.
